name: Lavion Aero
about: Lavion Aero, based at Ottawa Executive Airport (Z98) in Zeeland, Michigan, offers comprehensive aviation services including quality flight instruction, aircraft rentals, and aircraft maintenance. As a Part 61 flight school, Lavion Aero provides flexible, one-on-one training schedules tailored to individual students' needs and availability. The school operates seven days a week, with early morning, daytime, and evening hours available. Students can choose from a variety of aircraft, including the Cessna 150, Liberty XL-2, Cessna 172, Piper Cherokee 140, and Grumman Cheetah. Lavion Aero also accommodates aircraft owners and offers flight reviews for rusty pilots. With a commitment to personalized instruction and flexible scheduling, Lavion Aero is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals.
